Statute.Title: Anti-Personnel Mines Convention Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Mines antipersonnel, Loi de mise en oeuvre de la Convention sur les)

Minister.Text: (a) Minister of Foreign Affairs, for the purposes of all provisions of the Act, other than sections 8, 9, 10 and 22; (SI/99-58)
(b) Minister of National Defence, for the purposes of s. 8, 9, 10 and 18 of the Act; (SI/99-58)
(c) Minister of Public Works and Government Services, for the purposes of sections 18 and 22 of the Act; (SI/99-58)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1997, c. 33 in force 01.03.99 see SI/99-18
CIF, 1999, c. 31, s. 7 in force on assent 17.06.99
CIF, 2001, c. 34, s. 3 in force on assent 18.12.2001
